devdoc.author: Dmitry Urusov

params.author: creator of the content
params.groupId: group identificator to which new content is added
params.hash: hash to check the content existence

params._minimalPercentsToAccept: Minimal percents of group members to change the group content status (draft to published)
params._minimalVotes: Minimal votes required to change status of the group content
params.name: Unique group name

params._hash: Hash of the content to provide Proof of Existence concept for related content that off-chained stored
params.groupId: Group identification to which the content will belong
params.name: Content name

params.groupId: Group identification to which belong the requested content
params.index: Index of the content for that group

groupsMap.details: The reason why this map is internal is solidity limitation to access to Group.drafts property. Access to this data will be provided by custom getter
